fields.label: Show table of contents
fields.name: show_toc
fields.instructions: This enables a table of contents on a given resource page..

sub_fields.label: Video Caption
sub_fields.name: video_caption
sub_fields.instructions: Add a caption to describe the video being added. This is primarily for users with visual impairments

sub_fields.label: Note Upload
sub_fields.name: note_upload
sub_fields.instructions: If you are uploading resource files, please do so here. You can upload a maximum of 4 files.

sub_fields.label: Note Link
sub_fields.name: note_link
sub_fields.instructions: If you are adding links, please do so here. You can a maximum of 4 links

sub_fields.label: Link text
sub_fields.name: link_text
sub_fields.instructions: This is the text that be linked. Make sure it's descriptive and not just something like "Read More".

sub_fields.label: Note Url
sub_fields.name: note_url
sub_fields.instructions: If you are linking to an external website or a document to download, please enter the URL here.

sub_fields.label: Product Guide Link
sub_fields.name: recommended_product_guide
sub_fields.instructions: You can link through to any relevant guides in the resources section that relate to this product

sub_fields.label: Available Platform text
sub_fields.name: platform_text
sub_fields.instructions: You can change the default app platform text here if desired.  The default text should be pre-filled.
sub_fields.default_value: Apps for this service are available on the following platforms or systems.

sub_fields.label: Platform Link Text
sub_fields.name: platform_link_text
sub_fields.instructions: You can change the default product link text here is desired.  The default text should be pre-filled.
sub_fields.default_value: You can find information on where to download the apps for this service by following this link.

sub_fields.label: Dates / Times
sub_fields.instructions: Add the dates, time etc of the activity you are adding.

sub_fields.label: Start Date
sub_fields.name: activity_start
sub_fields.instructions: The start date is for the purpose of adding recurring events to calendars. It will not be shown on the front end of the website.

sub_fields.label: End Date
sub_fields.name: activity_end
sub_fields.instructions: The end date is for the purpose of adding recurring events to calendars. This will generally be the same as the start date.

sub_fields.label: Activity Repeats
sub_fields.name: activity_frequency_select
sub_fields.instructions: How often does this activity repeat?

sub_fields.label: On which day?
sub_fields.name: activity_day_select
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the day this activity is held on.

sub_fields.label: Position in month
sub_fields.name: activity_frequency_month
sub_fields.instructions: If this is a monthly activity, choose when this occurs. Start by selecting the increment eg "First" and then select the day in the next field.

sub_fields.label: Contact
sub_fields.instructions: Add contact details for the activity you are adding.

sub_fields.label: Organised by
sub_fields.name: activity_organised_by
sub_fields.instructions: You can link this activity to any organisation that is in our resource library using the "Organiser" field at the top of the page (just under "Choose a Category"). If the organisation is not in our library you can add it manually here
